item.title: TypeScript类型挑战
item.description: 前言 准备 & | Keyof extends infer 常见问题 [T] extends [X] vs T extends X K extends K Object vs object vs {} 最后 参考 前言 在上一篇文章，初步介绍了 TS 的内置工具类型，让我们对 TS 的类型转换有了初步的

item.title: TypeScript的内置类型
item.description: 前言 Awaited<Type> Released: 4.5 Partial<Type> Released: 2.1 Required<Type> Released: 2.1 Readonly<Type> Released: 2.1 Record<Keys, Type> Released: 2.1 Pick<Type, Keys> Released: 2.1 Omit<Type, Keys> Released: 3.5 Exclude<UnionType, ExcludedMembers> Released: 2.8 Extract<Type, Union> Released: 2.8 NonNullable<Type> Released: 2.8 Parameters<Type> Released: 3.1 ConstructorParameters<Type> Released: 3.1 ReturnType<Type> Released: 2.8 InstanceType<Type> Released: 2.8 ThisParameterType<Type> Released: 3.3 OmitThisParameter<Type> Released: 3.3 ThisType<Type> Released: 2.3 Intrinsic String Manipulation Types Uppercase<StringType> Lowercase<StringType> Capitalize<StringType> Uncapitalize<StringType> 最后 参考
